allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial setup: MobilePay Recurring API

- Initialize Node.js + TypeScript project
- Set up Prisma with PostgreSQL schema
- Configure Bull queue for job scheduling
- Implement core MobilePay services:
  * Access Token Service \(OAuth 2.0\)
  * Agreement Service \(create, status, cancel\)
  * Charge Service \(create, status, calculation\)
- Add configuration for database, queue, logger
- Create TypeScript type definitions for MobilePay API
- Set up ESLint, Prettier, and project structure

Database models:
- customers
- agreements
- charges
- subscription_sync

Next steps: Implement routes, scheduler, and webhook handlers

Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 3-4: Services, Routes, and Express App

Implemented remaining services:
- Charge Scheduler Service with daily cron job
- Webhook Handler Service for all MobilePay events
- Notification Service to communicate with FamilyMind

Created middleware:
- Error handling middleware with async wrapper
- Validation middleware using Joi schemas
- Authentication middleware \(API key + admin\)

Implemented REST API routes:
- Agreements: create, get status, cancel, list by customer
- Webhooks: receive and process MobilePay events
- Admin: upcoming charges, retry failed, trigger scheduler, stats

Main Express app:
- Complete app setup with helmet, cors, rate limiting
- Health check endpoint
- Charge scheduler auto-start
- Graceful shutdown handling

Next steps: Testing, deployment, and integration with FamilyMind

Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
